title: 25k-Mile 1986 Porsche 911 Turbo Coupe at No Reserve
description: This 1986 Porsche 911 Turbo coupe was initially delivered to Meister Porsche in Garden Grove, California, and it has remained in that state through the current owner's purchase in 2009. Showing 25k miles, the car is powered by a turbocharged 3.3-liter flat-six paired with a four-speed manual transaxle and is finished in black over black leather upholstery. Equipment includes four-wheel cross-drilled and ventilated disc brakes, Bilstein dampers, 18" multi-piece Rotiform CCV wheels, a sunroof, a rear spoiler, power-adjustable front sport seats, a Blaupunkt cassette stereo, and air conditioning. This 930 Turbo coupe is offered on dealer consignment at no reserve with a copy of the window sticker, manufacturer's literature, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a No Reserve: 25k-Mile 1986 Porsche 911 Turbo Coupe at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #187,411.
text: This 1986 Porsche 911 Turbo coupe was initially delivered to Meister Porsche in Garden Grove, California, and it has remained in that state through the current owner’s purchase in 2009. Showing 25k miles, the car is powered by a turbocharged 3.3-liter flat-six paired with a four-speed manual transaxle and is finished in black over black leather upholstery. Equipment includes four-wheel cross-drilled and ventilated disc brakes, Bilstein dampers, 18″ multi-piece Rotiform CCV wheels, a sunroof, a rear spoiler, power-adjustable front sport seats, a Blaupunkt cassette stereo, and air conditioning. This 930 Turbo coupe is offered on dealer consignment at no reserve with a copy of the window sticker, manufacturer’s literature, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title. The car is finished in black and features a sunroof, headlight washers, a rear spoiler, tinted windows, a rear window wiper, and black stone guards ahead of the rear wheels. Close-up photographs of the exterior finish and trim are shown in the gallery below. Black 18″ multi-piece Rotiform CCV wheels are mounted with Michelin Pilot Sport tires that have 2017 and 2019 date codes. Bilstein dampers are fitted, and braking is handled by four-wheel cross-drilled and ventilated discs. The power-adjustable front sport seats are upholstered in black leather and are complemented by a color-coordinated center console, door panels, and carpeting. Amenities include air conditioning, power windows, and a Blaupunkt cassette stereo. The four-spoke leather-wrapped steering wheel frames VDO instrumentation including a central tachometer with a 6,700-rpm redline as well as a 170-mph speedometer and gauges for oil pressure, oil temperature, oil level, fuel level, and boost pressure. The six-digit odometer shows 25k miles, approximately 500 of which were added under current ownership. The turbocharged 3.3-liter flat-six was factory rated at 282 horsepower and 278 lb-ft of torque. The selling dealer states that the spark plugs were recently replaced, and the car passed a California emission test in preparation for the sale. Power is sent to the rear wheels via a four-speed manual transaxle. A copy of the window sticker lists initial delivery to Meister Porsche in Garden Grove, California, as well as factory colors, equipment, and a total price of $54,798. Manufacturer’s literature will accompany the sale. The Carfax report is free of accidents or other reported damage. The car is registered as Planned Non-Operation in the state of California. html:
This 1986 Porsche 911 Turbo coupe was initially delivered to Meister Porsche in Garden Grove, California, and it has remained in that state through the current owner’s purchase in 2009. Showing 25k miles, the car is powered by a turbocharged 3.3-liter flat-six paired with a four-speed manual transaxle and is finished in black over black leather upholstery. Equipment includes four-wheel cross-drilled and ventilated disc brakes, Bilstein dampers, 18″ multi-piece Rotiform CCV wheels, a sunroof, a rear spoiler, power-adjustable front sport seats, a Blaupunkt cassette stereo, and air conditioning. This 930 Turbo coupe is offered on dealer consignment at no reserve with a copy of the window sticker, manufacturer’s literature, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title.

The car is finished in black and features a sunroof, headlight washers, a rear spoiler, tinted windows, a rear window wiper, and black stone guards ahead of the rear wheels. Close-up photographs of the exterior finish and trim are shown in the gallery below.

Black 18″ multi-piece Rotiform CCV wheels are mounted with Michelin Pilot Sport tires that have 2017 and 2019 date codes. Bilstein dampers are fitted, and braking is handled by four-wheel cross-drilled and ventilated discs.

The power-adjustable front sport seats are upholstered in black leather and are complemented by a color-coordinated center console, door panels, and carpeting. Amenities include air conditioning, power windows, and a Blaupunkt cassette stereo.

The four-spoke leather-wrapped steering wheel frames VDO instrumentation including a central tachometer with a 6,700-rpm redline as well as a 170-mph speedometer and gauges for oil pressure, oil temperature, oil level, fuel level, and boost pressure. The six-digit odometer shows 25k miles, approximately 500 of which were added under current ownership.

The turbocharged 3.3-liter flat-six was factory rated at 282 horsepower and 278 lb-ft of torque. The selling dealer states that the spark plugs were recently replaced, and the car passed a California emission test in preparation for the sale.

Power is sent to the rear wheels via a four-speed manual transaxle.

A copy of the window sticker lists initial delivery to Meister Porsche in Garden Grove, California, as well as factory colors, equipment, and a total price of $54,798. Manufacturer’s literature will accompany the sale.

The Carfax report is free of accidents or other reported damage.

The car is registered as Planned Non-Operation in the state of California.
